answers.answer: You need to tell your doctor about that.
A friend of mine had that happen to her .., a few weeks before she had her baby half of her face was numb and didn't go back to normal until after she had the baby but idk what caused it
Worst pain I've ever felt I pray it never happens. Again
You should really be checked out just to be safe. Those symptoms can be associated with preeclampsia.

I'm on my last 10 weeks I have a 3d/4d ultrasound schedule to see her next week and then my baby shower the week after that and prepping her room and clothes so I'll be keeping myself busy with all of that hopefully time flies!

question: The last 10 weeks or so of pregnancy..... I'm huge already tons of stretch marks had a scary migraine today that made my arms and hands go numb along with my mouth I was delirious it was very scary I had slurred speech to?? Its finally eased up and I drank a soda.... I pray it never happens again. What have u ladies been doing to pass the days?
title: how do i get threw it???
